leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 天文-时间域与瞬变检测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 去噪→检测→分类→告警→调度

unit.unit_name: 瞬变检测/触发/告警系统

queries: [WEB] time domain astronomy detection pipeline github

tools.name: fourpiskytools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for handling astronomical VOEvents for transient alerts
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools designed to help astronomers get started with sending or receiving VOEvents, which are standard packets for reporting transient astronomical events.

tools.name: Space_signal_detection_all4
tools.one_line_profile: Gravitational wave data denoising and signal detection
tools.detailed_description: A software package for denoising gravitational wave data and detecting signals, specifically targeted at space-based detection scenarios.

tools.name: Ampel-core
tools.one_line_profile: Core framework for the AMPEL astronomical alert analysis system
tools.detailed_description: The core component of AMPEL (Alice in Modular Provenance-Enabled Land), a modular and scalable platform for analyzing and processing high-throughput astronomical alert streams (e.g., from ZTF, LSST).

tools.name: Antares_Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Open source power system simulator for energy adequacy and economic performance
tools.detailed_description: A sequential Monte-Carlo simulator designed to assess the adequacy and economic performance of interconnected power systems over short or long-term horizons.

tools.name: antares-xpansion
tools.one_line_profile: Investment simulation extension for Antares Simulator
tools.detailed_description: An extension for Antares Simulator that performs investment simulations and capacity expansion planning for power systems.

tools.name: antares_craft
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for manipulating Antares Simulator studies
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to read, edit, and manage study files and configurations for the Antares Power System Simulator.

tools.name: AstroAccelerate
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated time-domain radio astronomy data processing
tools.detailed_description: A many-core accelerated software package for processing time-domain radio-astronomy data, focusing on real-time processing of large datasets for transient detection.

tools.name: GaTector
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for gaze object prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for gaze object prediction that utilizes a specific-general-specific (SGS) feature extractor to handle scene and head images for gaze estimation and object detection.

tools.name: fink-mm
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-messenger astrophysics correlation for Fink broker
tools.detailed_description: A module for the Fink broker that correlates Fink alerts with the General Coordinates Network (GCN) to enable multi-messenger astrophysics analysis.

tools.name: GWAS_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing GWAS summary statistics
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline for processing and quality controlling Genome-Wide Association Study (GWAS) summary statistic datasets.

tools.name: pymser
tools.one_line_profile: Marginal Standard Error Rule for transient regime detection in simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library applying the Marginal Standard Error Rule (MSER) to detect and truncate transient regimes in Grand Canonical Monte Carlo adsorption simulations.

tools.name: gwIAS-HM
tools.one_line_profile: Gravitational wave search pipeline with higher harmonics
tools.detailed_description: A gravitational wave search pipeline that incorporates higher harmonics, developed by the IAS GW group.

tools.name: GWAS-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: GWAS analysis pipeline from QC to summary statistics
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Genome-Wide Association Studies covering steps from quality control to generating summary statistics.

tools.name: GWENA
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Co-expression Network Analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for performing Gene Co-expression Network Analysis (GCNA), facilitating the construction and analysis of gene networks.

tools.name: ztf-alert-server
tools.one_line_profile: Alert repository server for ZTF alerts
tools.detailed_description: A server implementation for handling and storing alerts generated by the Zwicky Transient Facility (ZTF).

tools.name: mwa_trigger
tools.one_line_profile: VOEvent handling and triggering for MWA telescope
tools.detailed_description: A daemon and library for handling VOEvents and generating triggered observations for the Murchison Widefield Array (MWA) radio telescope.

tools.name: BnsLib
tools.one_line_profile: Library for binary neutron star GW data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A PyCBC-based library for working with binary neutron star or binary black hole gravitational wave data, specifically in the context of machine learning applications.

tools.name: Quinn2019_BurstHMM
tools.one_line_profile: Transient event detection using Hidden Markov Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Hidden Markov Models (HMM) for detecting transient burst events in time-series data, likely for neuroscience or similar signal processing applications.

tools.name: Water-Body-Detection-from-Satellite-Imagery
tools.one_line_profile: Water body detection using remote sensing indices
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting water bodies from satellite imagery using remote sensing techniques like NDWI, MNDWI, and supervised classification models.

tools.name: GWSpace
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-mission science data simulator for space-based gravitational wave detection
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool designed for space-based gravitational wave detection missions (like TianQin), enabling the generation of simulated scientific data for mission planning and analysis.

tools.name: TransientViT
tools.one_line_profile: Real/bogus transient classifier using CNN-ViT hybrid model
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model combining CNN and Vision Transformers for classifying transient candidates (real vs bogus) in the Kilodegree Automatic Transient Survey (KATS).

tools.name: perl-modules-for-voevent
tools.one_line_profile: Perl modules for handling IVOA standard VOEvent messages
tools.detailed_description: A library for parsing and handling VOEvent messages, which are the standard for astronomical transient alerts in the Virtual Observatory infrastructure.

tools.name: ALeRCE Client
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for the ALeRCE astronomical broker
tools.detailed_description: A client library to interact with the ALeRCE (Automatic Learning for the Rapid Classification of Events) broker, facilitating access to astronomical alerts and light curves.

tools.name: Light Curve Classifier
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning classifier for astronomical light curves
tools.detailed_description: A component of the ALeRCE broker system designed to classify astronomical objects based on their light curves using machine learning techniques.

tools.name: ALeRCE Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Processing pipeline for the ALeRCE astronomical broker
tools.detailed_description: The core processing pipeline for the ALeRCE broker, handling the ingestion, processing, and classification of astronomical alert streams.

tools.name: ZTF Explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for ZTF data via ALeRCE
tools.detailed_description: A web-based exploration tool for visualizing and analyzing ZTF (Zwicky Transient Facility) data provided by the ALeRCE broker.

tools.name: VAST Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Radio transient detection pipeline for the VAST project
tools.detailed_description: The data processing pipeline for the VAST (Variables and Slow Transients) survey on the ASKAP telescope, designed to detect radio transients.

tools.name: Fink Broker
tools.one_line_profile: Astronomy broker based on Apache Spark
tools.detailed_description: A scalable community broker for processing large streams of astronomical alerts (e.g., from ZTF, LSST) using Apache Spark, enabling real-time transient detection and classification.

tools.name: Fink Client
tools.one_line_profile: Client for manipulating Fink broker alerts
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight client library for users to interact with the Fink broker, query alerts, and retrieve data.

tools.name: Fink Science
tools.one_line_profile: Science modules for Fink broker alerts
tools.detailed_description: A collection of science modules and algorithms used within the Fink broker to add value to alerts, such as classification scores and cross-matching.

tools.name: Fink Science Portal
tools.one_line_profile: Web portal for exploring Fink broker data
tools.detailed_description: The web interface and backend for the Fink Science Portal, allowing users to visualize, search, and analyze astronomical alerts processed by Fink.

tools.name: Bilby
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for stochastic sampling and gravitational-wave inference
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly Bayesian inference library for gravitational-wave astronomy, providing a unified interface to various stochastic samplers.

tools.name: AMPEL
tools.one_line_profile: Modular and scalable platform for analyzing streaming data
tools.detailed_description: The Amazing Multipurpose Policy Engine (AMPEL) is a software framework designed for the analysis of high-throughput heterogeneous data streams, widely used in astronomy for transient alert processing (e.g., ZTF, LSST).

tools.name: rtpipe
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time fast transient detection pipeline for radio interferometric data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for searching and detecting fast radio transients (like FRBs) in real-time using visibility data from radio interferometers such as the VLA.

tools.name: DASH
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for automated spectral classification of supernovae
tools.detailed_description: Deep Automated Supernova Hostless (DASH) is a software package that automates the classification of supernova spectra using deep learning, capable of identifying type, age, and redshift.

tools.name: Dingo
tools.one_line_profile: Deep inference for gravitational-wave observations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library for performing rapid parameter estimation and inference on gravitational wave data, enabling fast analysis of compact binary coalescences.

tools.name: nf-gwas
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for genome-wide association studies (GWAS)
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline to perform state-of-the-art genome-wide association studies, including quality control, phasing, imputation, and association testing.

tools.name: gwin
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian inference package for gravitational-wave data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for performing Bayesian inference on gravitational-wave data, facilitating parameter estimation and model selection.

tools.name: PyCBC
tools.one_line_profile: Core package for gravitational-wave data analysis and signal detection
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software package used to analyze gravitational-wave data, detect signals (such as compact binary mergers), and infer their parameters. It is a standard tool in the LIGO/Virgo collaboration.

tools.name: SPANNER
tools.one_line_profile: Reconstruction algorithm for clinical photoacoustic imaging
tools.detailed_description: A robust algorithm called Superiorized Photo-Acoustic Non-NEgative Reconstruction (SPANNER) designed to reconstruct PA images in real-time, addressing limitations in viewing angles and imaging depth.

tools.name: bilby (Genomics)
tools.one_line_profile: Jax-based machine learning library for functional genomics
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning library implemented in Jax, specifically designed for functional genomics applications.

tools.name: IKMB GWAS Association
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for GWAS association testing
tools.detailed_description: The IKMB GWAS Association Testing Pipeline, designed to perform genome-wide association studies.

tools.name: IKMB GWAS QC
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for GWAS quality control
tools.detailed_description: The IKMB GWAS Quality Control Pipeline, providing automated quality control steps for genome-wide association study data.

tools.name: evo-mcts
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary Monte Carlo Tree Search for GW detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Automated Algorithmic Discovery for Gravitational-Wave Detection Guided by LLM-Informed Evolutionary Monte Carlo Tree Search.

tools.name: TrioGWAS
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for GWAS on trios
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline designed for performing Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS) specifically on trio data (parents and offspring).

tools.name: SAR Change Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based change detection for SAR imagery
tools.detailed_description: Code for the paper 'Improved Difference Images for Change Detection Classifiers in SAR Imagery Using Deep Learning', implementing methods for analyzing Synthetic Aperture Radar images.

tools.name: Comet
tools.one_line_profile: VOEvent transport system for astronomical transients
tools.detailed_description: A complete VOEvent transport system designed to receive and distribute astronomical event notifications (transients).

tools.name: time_to_detection
tools.one_line_profile: Time-to-detection simulations for PTA Gravitational Waves
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts for performing time-to-detection simulations for Pulsar Timing Array (PTA) detection of Gravitational Waves.

tools.name: bacterialGWAS
tools.one_line_profile: GWAS pipeline for bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for performing genome-wide association tests specifically tailored for bacterial genomes.

tools.name: SNEx2
tools.one_line_profile: Supernova Exchange built with TOM Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: The updated Supernova Exchange (SNEx), built with the TOM Toolkit and used by the Global Supernova Project collaboration for managing supernova observations.

tools.name: gwas_gemma
tools.one_line_profile: Simple pipeline for GWAS with GEMMA
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to perform Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS) using the GEMMA software.

tools.name: hdrvdp
tools.one_line_profile: Visible Difference Metric for HDR images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of HDR-VDP (High Dynamic Range Visible Difference Predictor), a metric for predicting visible differences in high dynamic range images, used in visual perception and image science research.

tools.name: Repetitive-transient-impact-detector
tools.one_line_profile: Detector for repetitive transient impacts in bearing faults
tools.detailed_description: Code for the paper 'Repetitive transient impact detection and its application in cross-machine bearing fault detection', used for mechanical signal processing and fault diagnosis.

tools.name: stdpipe
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Transient Detection Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools and routines for processing astronomical images and detecting transient objects.

tools.name: stdweb
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface for Simple Transient Detection Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform for the Simple Transient Detection Pipeline (stdpipe), allowing users to interact with transient detection workflows.

tools.name: Dedisp.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Brute-force dedispersion for radio transient detection
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for brute-force dedispersion, a key step in detecting radio transients (like FRBs or pulsars) in radio astronomy data.

tools.name: relativebilbying
tools.one_line_profile: Relative binning for Bilby GW inference
tools.detailed_description: Code to include relative binning techniques in the Bilby library for faster gravitational wave parameter estimation.

tools.name: Lifebit GWAS
tools.one_line_profile: GWAS pipeline using SAIGE
tools.detailed_description: A Genome-Wide Association Study (GWAS) pipeline implemented using SAIGE, designed for scalable analysis of genetic data.

tools.name: EdgRec
tools.one_line_profile: Surface anomaly detection via edge reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Reconstruction from edge image combined with color and gradient difference for industrial surface anomaly detection.

tools.name: nrutils_dev
tools.one_line_profile: Python API for Numerical Relativity data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Python API for low-level analysis of Numerical Relativity (NR) data, including Psi4, strain, modeling, and interfaces to LAL/PyCBC.

tools.name: Lasair Project Management
tools.one_line_profile: Event handling platform for LSST:UK (Lasair)
tools.detailed_description: The event handling site and project management code for Lasair, the LSST:UK alert broker, used for processing and filtering astronomical transients.

tools.name: TOM (Toolkit for OOM)
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for Observable Operator Modeling
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for Observable Operator Models (OOMs), which are used for modeling stochastic processes and sequence data.

tools.name: witsGWAS
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Human GWAS analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Human GWAS analysis that accommodates both Affymetrix (raw .CEL files) and Illumina (Plink binaries) data.

tools.name: TheFaultEngine
tools.one_line_profile: Engine for transient alarm detection and root cause analysis
tools.detailed_description: A fault analysis engine consisting of modules for transient alarm detection, root cause analysis, and correlated clusters, likely for industrial or systems engineering.

tools.name: ephemeris
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for calculating solar, planetary, and stellar ephemerides
tools.detailed_description: A pure JavaScript implementation for performing astronomical ephemeris calculations, including positions of the sun, planets, comets, asteroids, and stars, suitable for web-based astronomical applications.

tools.name: nessai
tools.one_line_profile: Nested Sampling with Artificial Intelligence for Bayesian inference
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that implements nested sampling algorithms accelerated by normalizing flows, designed for Bayesian inference tasks in physics and astronomy, particularly for gravitational wave data analysis.

tools.name: nf-gwas-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS)
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Nextflow for performing Genome-Wide Association Studies, automating the workflow from data processing to association analysis.

tools.name: pygcn
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for processing NASA GCN notices
tools.detailed_description: A Python library provided by NASA-GCN for parsing and processing Gamma-ray Coordinates Network (GCN) notices, enabling automated handling of astronomical alerts.

tools.name: nf-core/gwas
tools.one_line_profile: Portable pipeline for Genome-Wide Association Studies using Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A community-curated Nextflow pipeline for performing Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS), ensuring reproducibility and portability across different computing environments.

tools.name: antaresEditObject
tools.one_line_profile: R package to edit Antares Simulator study parameters
tools.detailed_description: An R package developed by RTE for editing the input data and parameters of Antares Simulator studies, facilitating the configuration of large-scale power system simulations.

tools.name: antaresProcessing
tools.one_line_profile: R package for processing Antares Simulator output data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for processing and aggregating the output data from Antares Simulator, enabling efficient analysis of power system simulation results.

tools.name: antaresRead
tools.one_line_profile: R package to import and explore Antares Simulator results
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to import, manipulate, and explore simulation results generated by the Antares Simulator, serving as a bridge between the simulator and R's data analysis ecosystem.

tools.name: antaresViz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization package for Antares Simulator data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for generating interactive visualizations of data from Antares Simulator studies, helping researchers and engineers analyze power system dynamics.

tools.name: DIA
tools.one_line_profile: Difference Image Analysis for Wide-Field Surveys
tools.detailed_description: A C implementation of Difference Image Analysis (DIA) algorithms, designed for detecting transient astronomical events in wide-field survey data by subtracting reference images from new observations.

tools.name: Kowalski
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-survey data archive and alert broker for time-domain astronomy
tools.detailed_description: Kowalski is a system for archiving and accessing astronomical data from multiple surveys, specifically designed to handle the high-volume data streams and alert brokering required for time-domain astronomy.

tools.name: Sherlock
tools.one_line_profile: The QUB Transient Classifier for astronomical sources
tools.detailed_description: Sherlock is a transient classifier package designed to cross-match and classify astronomical transients against a massive library of historical catalogs, aiding in the rapid identification of new sources.

tools.name: SFFT
tools.one_line_profile: Saccadic Fast Fourier Transform algorithm for image subtraction
tools.detailed_description: SFFT (Saccadic Fast Fourier Transform) is an algorithm and python tool for efficient image subtraction in Fourier space, a critical step in detecting transient astronomical events by comparing new observations with reference images.

tools.name: ggwd
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for synthetic gravitational-wave data
tools.detailed_description: ggwd is a tool that utilizes PyCBC and LALSuite to generate synthetic gravitational-wave data, facilitating the training and testing of machine learning models for gravitational wave detection.

tools.name: voevent-parse
tools.one_line_profile: Library for parsing and manipulating VOEvent packets
tools.detailed_description: voevent-parse is a Python library built on lxml.objectify for parsing, manipulating, and creating VOEvent packets, which are the standard format for reporting astronomical transient events.
